What Dharma does the master teach to liberate people?

What Dharma does the great virtuous one teach to liberate people?

How many times have you lectured on it?

Who spoke this sūtra?

The Chan master is playing with you.

This person does not understand the meaning of what I have said.

If one sees me in terms of form,

Which one is the Tathāgata?
